content: last stitch and gently pull to tighten weave in ends and block to ensure that the top is straight or if you prefer slightly curved and the points are pointy dragonfly wings v1 6 boo knits © o o λ o o ktb ← 81 / k2tog cs o o o λ o o ktb ← 79 magic_ring make one right λ o o o λ o o ktb ← 77 ml make one left λ o o o λ o o ktb ← 75 λ s2kpsso cs magic_ring o o λ o ktb ← 73 ktb knit through the back cs magic_ring o o λ o ktb ← 71 pattern repeat cs o o / \ o ktb ← 69 cs centre stitch cs ktb and all wrong side row → 68 cs magic_ring o / \ o ktb ← 67 bead after working stitch the centre stitch is shown on both right and left hand sides 83 ← ktb o o o o o o cs change to 5 5mm needles us 9 81 ← ktb o o λ o o o o cs 79 ← ktb o o λ o o o cs 77 ← ktb o o λ o o o λ 75 ← ktb o o λ o o o λ 73 ← ktb o λ o o ml cs 71 ← ktb o λ o o ml cs 69 ← ktb o / \ o o cs 68 → and all wrong side row ktb cs 67 ← ktb o / \ o ml cs please note the s2kpsso on row 75 becomes the centre stitch spine of the shawl as one stitch each side of the centre and the centre stitch will be used stitch markers will therefore move as the double centred decrease straddles the markers copyright agreement this
